noteR.para: To avoid all risk of damage to the systems, apply the safety and cleanliness instructions and operation recommendations before carrying out any repairengine : precautions for the repairGIEMR-001545.
It is strictly forbidden to apply any pressure to the engine oil sump. Damage to the sump may also damage the engine by:

ul.li: blocking the strainer,
raising the oil level above maximum, with a risk of engine racing.

procstep.para: Remove the engine - gearbox assemblyengine and gearbox assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-001096.
Disconnect the manual gearbox from the enginegearbox assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-000921(21A, Manual gearbox).
Remove the accessories belt(s)accessories belt : removal - refittingGIEMR-000720.
Fit the flywheel locking toolFlywheel locking tool.Mot. 582-01on the cylinder block.
Remove:

ul.li: the crankshaft accessories pulleycrankshaft accessories pulley : removal - refittingGIEMR-001655,
the clutch disc and pressure plateclutch plate : removal - refittingGIEMR-000661(20A, Clutch),
the flywheelflywheel : removal - refittingGIEMR-002431,
the flywheel locking toolFlywheel locking tool.Mot. 582-01.

procstep.para: Place the engine on the component supportcomponent support equipment : useGIEMR-001522.
Drain the engineengine oil : draining - refillingGIEMR-001296.
Remove:

ul.li: the right-hand suspended engine mountingsuspended engine mounting : removal - refittingGIEMR-002008,
the timing belttiming belt : removal - refittingGIEMR-000726,
the air filter unitair filter box : removal - refittingGIEMR-000117,
the ignition coilignition coil : removal - refittingGIEMR-000270.
the throttle valvethrottle valve : removal - refittingGIEMR-000364,
the petrol injector railinjector rail : removal - refittingGIEMR-001884,
the inlet distributorintake distributor : removal - refittingGIEMR-002040,
the rocker coverrocker cover : removal - refittingGIEMR-000738,
the cylinder headcylinder head : removal - refittingGIEMR-000741,
the exhaust manifoldexhaust manifold : removal - refittingGIEMR-000563,
the water chambercoolant outlet unit : removal - refittingGIEMR-000129,
the coolant temperature sensorcoolant temperature sensor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000354,
the spark plugsspark plug : removal - refittingGIEMR-000272,
the camshaftcamshaft : removal - refittingGIEMR-000143,
the valvesvalve : removal - refittingGIEMR-002101.

procstep.para: Clean the cylinder headcylinder head : cleaningGIEMR-000744.
Check:

ul.li: the cylinder headcylinder head : checkGIEMR-000739,
the camshaftcamshaft : checkGIEMR-000142,
the valves and the valve springsvalve : checkGIEMR-002100.

noteR.para: Replace the parts whose values are outside the permitted tolerance values.

procstep.para: Remove the alternatoralternator : removal - refittingGIEMR-000049.
Remove the air conditioning compressorair conditioning compressor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000616(62A, Air conditioning).
Remove the power-assisted steering pumppower-assisted steering pump : removal - refittingGIEMR-001674(36B, Power-assisted steering).
Remove:

ul.li: the multifunction supportmultifunction support : removal - refittingGIEMR-001996,
the pinking sensor,
the oil level sensor (depending on the vehicle equipment)engine oil level sensor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000305,
the oil pressure sensorengine oil pressure sensor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000342,
the oil filteroil filter : removal - refittingGIEMR-001243,
the sumpengine oil sump : removal - refittingGIEMR-000475,
the gearbox side crankshaft sealcrankshaft seal, gearbox side : removal - refittingGIEMR-001324,
the crankshaft seal on the timing sidecrankshaft seal, timing end : removal - refittingGIEMR-001325,
the coolant pumpwater pump : removal - refittingGIEMR-001682,
the oil pumpengine oil pump : removal - refittingGIEMR-001687,
the "piston - con rod" assembly of every cylinderpiston - con rod : removal - refittingGIEMR-001762,
the crankshaftcrankshaft : removal - refittingGIEMR-002404,
the cylinder blockcylinder block : removal - refittingGIEMR-000479.

procstep.para: Clean the cylinder blockcylinder block : cleaningGIEMR-000481.
Check:

ul.li: the cylinder blockcylinder block : checkGIEMR-000478,
the piston - con rod assembliespiston - con rod : checkGIEMR-001761,
the crankshaftcrankshaft : checkGIEMR-002403.

noteR.para: Replace the parts whose values are outside the permitted tolerance values.

procstep.para: Parts always to be replaced:

ul.li: all seals,
the cooling circuit hoses if they are damaged,
the accessories and timing belts,
the timing and accessories tensioners and rollers,
the crankshaft accessories pulley bolt,
the camshaft sprocket bolt,
the exhaust manifold nuts,
the exhaust manifold studs (if removed),
the oil filter,
the flywheel bolts,
the con rod cap bolts,
the crankshaft bearing cap bolts.

noteR.para: The gasket faces must be clean, dry and free from grease (avoid finger marks)
Applying excess sealant could cause it to be squeezed out when parts are tightened. A mixture of sealant and fluid could damage certain components (engine, radiator, etc.).

procstep.para: Refit the cylinder blockcylinder block : removal - refittingGIEMR-000479.

When replacing the cylinder block, crankshaft or crankshaft bearing shells, always determine the thickness class for each bearing shell that will be fitted on each crankshaft bearing, to ensure that journal clearance is within tolerancescrankshaft : checkGIEMR-002403.

noteR.para: Any clearances of the crankshaft journal outside the tolerances can cause engine damage.

ul.li: the crankshaftcrankshaft : removal - refittingGIEMR-002404,

the coolant pumpwater pump : removal - refittingGIEMR-001682,
the crankshaft seal on the timing sidecrankshaft seal, timing end : removal - refittingGIEMR-001325,
the gearbox side crankshaft sealcrankshaft seal, gearbox side : removal - refittingGIEMR-001324,
the sumpengine oil sump : removal - refittingGIEMR-000475,
the oil filteroil filter : removal - refittingGIEMR-001243,
the oil pressure sensorengine oil pressure sensor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000342,
the oil level sensor (depending on the vehicle equipment)engine oil level sensor : removal - refittingGIEMR-000305,
the pinking sensor,
the multifunction supportmultifunction support : removal - refittingGIEMR-001996.

procstep.para: Remove the engine from the component supportcomponent support equipment : useGIEMR-001522.
Refit:

ul.li: the flywheelflywheel : removal - refittingGIEMR-002431,

the flywheel locking toolFlywheel locking tool.Mot. 582-01on the cylinder block,

procstep.para: Remove the flywheel locking toolFlywheel locking tool.Mot. 582-01from the cylinder block.
